definition: to deliver/to send a letter/a letter (of complaint, opinion etc)
to cast/to send/to throw oneself (into the river etc)/to seek refuge/to place oneself into the hands of
abbr. for 書經|书经[Shu1 jing1]

sentences.english: They have written into the television station the complain about the moral level of the show.
sentences.chinese: 他们投书电视台，抱怨节目内容不健康。

sentences.english: Send mail to poster when their posting is held for approval?
sentences.chinese: 当投书遭留置移送裁决时是否要通知寄信人？

definition: to write a letter (to the authorities)/to present a petition
to put forward a suggestion (to sb in a senior position)/to offer a word of advice
to expose (e.g., wrongdoing)/to accuse (in court)/to impeach/to denounce
to make a suggestion/to state (one's views, ideas etc)/suggestion/advice/idea
to accuse of misconduct (in official task)/to impeach
to circulate (a protest or call to arms)/to promulgate
